sentences.en: Characteristic industries have the salient features of territoriality, advantage and hierarchy.
sentences.cn: 特色产业具有地域性 、 势性和层次性等基本特征.

sentences.en: Chronic fatigue is also one of the salient features of depression.
sentences.cn: 慢性疲劳也是抑郁症的显著特点之一。

sentences.en: Financial convergence is the salient phenomenon under the economic globalization.
sentences.cn: 金融趋同受一定条件的制约,开放经济条件下金融趋同有多种实现路径.

sentences.en: He read the salient facts quickly.
sentences.cn: 他快速浏览了重要的事实。

sentences.en: He took me around our new offices, pointing out all the salient features.
sentences.cn: 他领我去我们的新办公室参观, 并一一指出显著特色.

sentences.en: Honesty is his most salient characteristic.
sentences.cn: 诚实是他最显著的特点.

sentences.en: It was the German salient around Kharkov that suffered.
sentences.cn: 德军在哈尔科夫周围的突出阵地受到了袭击.

sentences.en: Its salient features are: financing directness, timeliness and convenience.
sentences.cn: 其显著特点是: 融资的直接性 、 时效性和简便性.

sentences.en: Other salient features of the case include fever, hematuria, hemolysis, and coagulopathy.
sentences.cn: 这个病例其他显著的特点包括发热, 血尿, 溶血作用和凝血病.

sentences.en: She pointed out all the salient feature of the building.
sentences.cn: 她指出了该建筑物的全部显著特征.

sentences.en: She pointed out all the salient features of the building.
sentences.cn: 她指出了该建物的全部显着特徵.

sentences.en: She pointed out the salient features of the new design.
sentences.cn: 她指出新设计的几个显著特征。

sentences.en: The salient feature in the case is odwe.
sentences.cn: 那里的显著特征是气味.

sentences.en: The salient object of last Friday's performance was obviously to isolate Poland.
sentences.cn: 上星期五那一幕戏的主要目标,显然在于孤立波兰.

sentences.en: the salient points of the report
We will here only outline the salient points.
sentences.cn: 这里我们仅仅概述一下要点.

words.tran_cn: 显著的；[军]突出的；跳跃的

trans.tran_cn: 显著的，突出的，重要的，主要的，跳跃的，（指角）凸出的
trans.tran_en: the salient points or features of something are the most important or most noticeable parts of it
